dict.string: Zeratul automatically cloaks when out of combat for 2 seconds. Taking damage or attacking reveals him.
Flings a Singularity Spike towards the target that sticks to the first enemy it contacts. Deals ### damage after 1 second and slows the enemy by 40% for 3 seconds.
Teleports to the target location. Using this ability does not break cloak.
Gains +25% attack speed, 15% life steal on auto attacks, and charges enemies. Lasts 6 seconds.

Traps targets for 5 seconds. Heroes, minions and structures become invulnerable.
Caster is immune.

Basic attacks increase the Demon Hunter's basic attack damage by 2% and movement speed by 1%. Stacks up to 10 times. After not attacking for 3 seconds, Demon Hunter loses stacks at a rate of 1 per second.
Deals ### damage to the first target it contacts, then seeks out up to 2 additional enemies dealing $$$ damage. Can hit an enemy multiple times.
Deals ### damage to enemies within the target area.

Rapidly attacks nearby enemies for ### damage per hit, prioritizing heroes over minions. Demon Hunter is able to move and use vault while strafing, and instantly gains 10 stacks of Hatred. Lasts for 3 seconds.
Launches 2 waves of Shadow Beasts that deal ### damage to enemies within the target area, stunning them for 0.5 seconds per wave.
When killed, Uther becomes an invicible spirit for up to 10 seconds, reducing his death timer by the same amount. As a spirit, Uther's abilities and basic attacks do 100% healing and 50% damage.
Heals an allied target for ### health.
Deals ### damage to enemies in a line, and heals any ally it touches for $$$ health.
Deals ### damage and stuns the target for 1 second.
Makes the target ally invulnerable and increases their movement speed by 20% for 3 seconds.
Deals ### damage and stuns nearby enemies for 1.5 seconds.
Marks a target enemy, increasing all damage taken by 25% and revealing them for 4 seconds.
Heals an ally for ###, automatically healing Tyrande for $$$.
Sentinel travels across the battleground revealing in its path. Deals ### damage to the first enemy hero hit and reveals them for 5 seconds.
After a short delay, deals ### damage and stuns enemies in the target area for 1 second.
Cloaks Tyrande and all allies on the map for 8 seconds, and grants them a 30% move speed bonus for 3 seconds.
Deals ### damage per second to all enemies in a target area. Slows enemies by 20% for 2 seconds. Lasts 8 seconds.
When Tyrael is about to die he becomes invulnerable and explodes after 3.5 seconds. Deals ### damage to nearby enemies. Tyrael resurrects 20% faster for every hero hit with Archangel's Wrath.

Deals ### damage to enemies within target area, slowing them by 25%.
Reactivating while the blade is present will teleport Tyrael to his blade, dealing ### damage and slowing enemies by 25% in an area around it.
Shields Tyrael against ### damage and nearby allies against $$$ damage for 4 seconds.
Tyrael rakes the target area for ### damage. Allies moving through the targeted area gain 25% increased movement speed for 2 seconds.
Charges the target, dealing ### damage and stunning them for 2 seconds. While charging, nearby enemies are knocked back and take $$$ damage.

While channeling, Tyrael makes all nearby allied heroes invulnerable and unstoppable. Lasts 3 seconds.
Does not affect Tyrael.
Before attacking, Tychus must wind up his Minigun briefly. Once wound up, he attacks much faster than other heroes.
Focus Tychus' minigun on the target, dealing ### damage to the target over 5 seconds. Other targets in the cone take $$$ damage. Can be retargeted.
Tychus lobs a grenade that explodes for ### damage. Enemies hit are pushed away from the explosion's epicenter.
Charge forward and instantly wind up Tychus' minigun.

Tychus pilots the Odin, gaining a second health pool and reducing all crowd control effects by 50%. Basic attacks in the Odin do heavy damage and no longer require a windup. Tychus gains the ability to fire Ragnarok Missiles and Annihilate to devastate a large area. Lasts 23 seconds.
Summons a Laser Drill that deals ### damage per second. Able to be retargeted by reactivating. Lasts 22 seconds.
Greatly increases Tassadar's vision radius and allows him to detect enemy heroes. Lasts for 7 seconds.
Shields target ally, absorbing ### damage before breaking. Lasts for 8 seconds.
Deals ### damage per second to enemies in target area and slows attack and movement speeds by 35%. Lasts 4 seconds.
Tassadar becomes invulnerable and cloaked. Lasts for 2 seconds.
Tassadar gains a ### point shield, his basic attacks deal $$$ damage, and his basic attacks splash for @@@ additional damage. Lasts for 15 seconds.
Creates a Force Wall that blocks all units from pathing through it. Lasts for 3 seconds. Activate again to remove Force Wall.
When damaged, Stitches emits a gas cloud that persists for 4 seconds. Enemies who enter it are poisoned for ### damage over 3 seconds.
Pulls the first enemy it contacts towards Stitches, dealing ### damage and stunning them for 0.5 seconds.
Deals ### damage to enemies within the target area.
Deals ### damage to minions or $$$ damage to heroes. Restores 20% of Stitches' maximum health.
Emits bile that deals ### damage per second to enemies within, slowing them by 35%. Lasts 8 seconds.

Completely consume target enemy hero, trapping them in Stitches' stomach for 3.5 seconds and dealing ### damage. The trapped hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources.
Cannot be used on massive Heroes.
Sonya uses Fury instead of mana, which is gained by attacking or taking damage. Sonya also gains 10% move speed for 4 seconds after using an ability.
Throws out a chained spear that pulls Sonya to the first enemy unit it hits, dealing ### damage and briefly stunning them. If Ancient Spear connects, Sonya generates 20 Fury.
Deals ### damage to target enemy, and $$$ damage to enemies behind the target.
Deals ### damage to nearby enemies over 3 seconds, and heal for 20% of damage dealt.
Leap into the air, dealing ### damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

Gain 25 Fury and +30% bonus damage to all basic attacks and abilities. Silences, stuns, and roots against your hero have their duration reduced by 50%. Wrath of the Berserker costs 4 Fury per second to stay active, and will be removed when out of Fury.
Attacks deal 40% bonus damage to enemies over 4.5 distance away.
Creates 3 mines that deal ### damage and slow enemies by 25% for 1.5 seconds. Mines last for 35 seconds.
Increases basic attack range by 5, sight range by 3, and attack damage to minions or structures by 30%. Attacks deal 25% splash damage. Cannot move in siege mode.
Deals ### damage to enemies in path. Reveals as it travels.
Deals ### damage on impact. Additionally deals $$$ damage per second. Lasts 4 seconds.
Enemies killed within a short time of being damaged by Raynor reduce the cooldown of his abilities by 1 second. Enemy heroes killed reduce the cooldown by 10 seconds.
Fires a high-powered round that deals ### damage and knocks away all enemies.
Raynor buffs himself for 20% bonus attack speed and damage for 8 seconds. Nearby allies gain half of this bonus while near Raynor.
Automatically activates to heal Raynor for ### when he is below 30% health.
The Hyperion slowly travels forward, dealing ### damage to up to 4 random enemy targets in its path. Lasts for 12 seconds.
Summons two cloaked Banshees that follow Raynor for a short time and attack what he attacks. Each Banshee attacks for 2 volleys of ### damage each.
Nova cloaks when out of combat for 2 seconds. Taking damage or attacking reveals her.
Deals ### damage to the first target it contacts.
Deals ### damage to an enemy and slows it by 30% for 2.25 seconds.

Spawns a cloaked decoy for 5 seconds that appears to attack enemies.
Using this ability does not break cloak.
Reveals the target hero and after 0.8 second, fires 3 shots that strike the first hero or structure they come in contact with. Each shot deals ### damage.
After a short delay, deals ### damage to enemies within target area. Unlimited range.

Ability and attack damage poisons enemies for ### additional damage over 4 seconds.
If a poisoned enemy dies, the Witch Doctor regenerates 1% Health and 1% Mana.
Deals ### damage on impact and creates 3 Corpse Spiders that deal $$$ damage. Spiders last for 4 seconds.
After a short delay, creates a ring of Zombies surrounding the target area that deal ### damage. Lasts for 3 seconds.
Creates 5 toads that each deal ### damage upon contact. Toads last for 3 seconds.
Summons a Ravenous Spirit for 8 seconds. Deals ### damage per second. The Witch Doctor cannot move while channeling.

Creates a Gargantuan that attacks for ### damage. The Gargantuan also stomps nearby enemies for $$$ damage, slowing their movement speed by 30%. The Gargantuan can grab enemy minions, increasing his attack damage by 20% for the next three attacks. Lasts 20 seconds.
Places a Murloc Egg at target location, revealing the nearby area. If Murky dies, Murky will respawn at the Egg after 5 seconds.
Releases slimy fish oil of nearby enemies, doing ### damage and applying slime, dealing $$$ damage every second, revealing and slowing enemies by 20% for 8 seconds.
Launches a pufferfish at the target point. After 5 seconds, the fish will blow up for ### damage ($$$ damage to structures). Enemies can attack the fish to destroy it and prevent it from exploding.
Murky becomes unstoppable and invulnerable for 2 seconds. While active, Murky cannot attack or use abilities.

Murky commands a legion of murlocs to charge in a target direction, each one leaping onto the first enemy hero or structure they find. Each murloc deals ### damage and slows its target by 15% for 5 seconds.
Summon an octopus to stun target enemy for 3 seconds while you poke them for 1 damage per second.
Regenerates ### health each second when he has not taken damage for at least 6 seconds. When below 30% health, increased to $$$ health per second.
Deals ### damage to the first enemy it contacts, stunning it for 1.5 seconds.
Deals ### damage and slows enemies by 25% for 2.5 seconds.
Leaps to a location, dealing ### damage to enemies within the target area.
Muradin gains ### health and his weapon attacks stun enemies. Lasts 20 seconds.
Deals ### damage. Knocks the target back, hitting enemies in the way for $$$ damage and knocking them back slightly.
Grants target allied hero 100 mana over 10 seconds
Heals the targeted ally for ### health instantly and an additional $$$ health over the next 10 seconds.
Deals ### damage to enemies within target area and reveals them for 2 seconds.
Roots enemies within the target area for 1.5 seconds, and deals ### damage per second. Area affected grows larger over 3 seconds.
Heals ### health per second to nearby allies over 10 seconds.
After a short delay, deals ### damage in a large area surrounding Malfurion. Enemies hit are silenced for 3 seconds.
After being hit by an enemy attack, Li Li runs 20% faster for 1 second.

Toss a refreshing cup of brew to the lowest health ally within range, prioritizing heroes over minions. It restores ### health and $$$ mana.
Can target Li Li, but restores no mana.
Li Li summons a baby Cloud Serpent to assist the target allied hero. The Cloud Serpent follows the hero around, attacking nearby enemies for ### damage. Lasts 10 seconds.

Li Li throws a cloud of Blinding Wind at the 3 nearest enemy heroes, dealing ### damage. Minions will be hit if there are not enough heroes in range. The targets are blinded, missing with their next basic attack. the blind debuff lasts 4 seconds.
Rapidly tosses brew to the most injured nearby allies, prioritizing heroes of minions. It restores a total of ### health and $$$ mana over 6 seconds. Can target Li Li, but restores no mana.

Li Li summons a Water Dragon that charges an attack for 3 seconds, then does ### damage to the nearest enemy hero. Enemies near the target take half damage, and all hit units are slowed by 60% for 3 seconds.

10% of attack damage and 20% of ability damage done to non-Heroic targets is turned into Shields for 6 seconds and is refreshed upon damage application. Kerrigan gains double this amount when damage is done to Heroic targets. The Shield's maximum value increases as you level.
Current maximum: ###
Leaps to a target, dealing ### damage.
Deals ### damage to enemies within a target area, stunning them for 1 second.
Pulls enemies within the target area towards Kerrigan, dealing ### damage.
Deals ### damage per second to enemies nearby. Lasts for 12 seconds.
Summons an Ultralisk that deals ### damage. Attacks splash to nearby enemies for $$$ damage. Lasts for 20 seconds.
Illidan's Basic Attacks heal him for 20% of damage dealt and reduce his cooldowns by 1 seconds.
Dives the target, dealing ### damage and slowing the target by 80% for 0.35 seconds. Illidan flips to the other side of the target.
Dashes towards target point, dealing ### damage to enemies along the way. If Illidan hits an enemy, his Basic Attacks do 25% more damage for 4 seconds.
Cause incoming basic attacks to miss for 1.5 seconds.
Transforms into demon form at the target location. Deal ### damage in the area. Illidan gains $$$ temporary max health for each hero hit, and gains 20% increased attack speed. Lasts for 18 seconds.
Charges to a target unit, dealing ### damage on impact and stunning the target for 1 second.

Passive: Destroyed enemy Structures and your own Rock-It! Turrets drop scrap. Collecting scrap restores 30 Mana and reduces the cooldown of abilities by 6 seconds over 3 seconds.
Active: Dismantle a target Rock-It! Turret into scrap.
Creates a turret that deals ### damage. Lasts for 30 seconds.
Charged attack that deals ### to $$$ damage to enemies in path. Damage and range increase the longer the ability is charged up.
Places a bomb that deals ### damage to enemies within target area after 2.5 seconds, stunning them for 2 seconds.
Pulls enemies towards the center of the target area after a 1.5 second delay and deals ### damage.

Transforms in to a Robo-Goblin. Basic Attacks deal an additional 250% damage to minions, mercenaries, and structures and also reduces the duration of Crowd Control effects by 50%. Lasts for 16 seconds.
After not taking damage for 6 seconds, Falstad gains 20% increased movement speed.
Deals ### damage to enemies in a line, slowing them by 25% for 2 seconds. Returns after thrown.

Passive: Deals ### damage to a random nearby enemy every 8 seconds.
Activate: Deals ### damage to up to 4 nearby enemies. Hitting the same enemy multiple times causes the damage to be reduced by 25% each hit.
Dashes to an area. Grants ### shield for 2 seconds.
After a 1.5 second delay, deal ### damage to all enemies near Falstad, stunning non-structure targets for 1.5 seconds.
Deals ### damage to enemies within the targeted area.
Brightwing heals nearby allied heroes for ### every 4 seconds.
Deals ### damage in a small area and $$$ damage in a larger area.
Deals ### damage. Target enemy cannot attack or use abilities for 2 seconds.
Target ally to increase their move speed by 25% and block up to 2 hero basic attacks, reducing their damage by 50%. Lasts for 4 seconds.
Creates and expanding nova of wind, dealing ### damage to enemies and pushing them away from the center.
For 10 seconds you may teleport to nearby allies by right clicking on them, healing them for ### instantly, and another $$$ over 3 seconds.
Activate to cause Arthas' next basic attack to do 100% increased damage and restore 30 mana.
Throws a Death Coil at a target enemy, dealing ### damage. Death Coil can be cast on Arthas to heal himself for $$$ health.
Roots enemies within the target area in place for 1.5 seconds and deals ### damage.
Deals ### damage per second to nearby enemies. Slows enemies' move speed by 6%, stacking up to 5 times. Drains 8 mana per second. Lasts until cancelled or Arthas runs out of mana.
Deals ### damage and slows enemy heroes or freezes minions for 10 seconds and structures for 20 seconds.
Summons Ghouls for 15 seconds. Sacrifice ghouls to heal for ### health.

Gains 10 souls per hero killed, or 1 per minion. For each soul, Diablo gains 5 maximum health. At 100 souls, Diablo's death timer decreases to 5 seconds and Diablo loses 100 soulstones upon death. Maximum 100 stacks.
Charges and enemy, dealing ### damage and stunning them for 0.5 seconds. If the enemy is knocked into an unpathable location, they are instead stunned for 1 second.
Unleashes fire waves in all directions that deal ### damage each.
Grabs the target and slams in behind Diablo, dealing ### damage and stunning for 0.25 seconds.
Creates a demonic rune under enemy heroes no matter where they are on the battleground. After a short period the rune explodes dealing ### damage and stunning for 2 seconds.
Diablo becomes unmovable and channels a cone of lightning that deals ### damage over 5 seconds. The area affected by this spell changes based on your mouse cursor's position.
When E.T.C. casts a spell, he and nearby allies gain 25% attack speed for 3 seconds. Allied minions gain half the bonus.
Slides to a location dealing ### damage to enemies in his path and stunning them for 1 second.
Deals ### damage to nearby enemies, knocking them back and stunning them briefly.
E.T.C. regenerates ### health per second for 4 seconds.
Stuns surrounding enemies for 4 seconds. Forces enemies to dance.
Leaps to any location. Deals ### damage to enemies in the target area, slowing them for 3 seconds.
Abathur spawns a Locust to attack down the nearest lane every 20 seconds.

Assists the target allied unit or structure allowing Abathur to shield them and use new abilities from the host. Lasts for 45 seconds.
Cannot be used on self, Grave Golems, or summoned units.

Spawns a mine-like nest at a location that becomes active after a short arming time. Deals (35 + 15 per level) damage to enemies that contact it, and reveals the enemy for 4 seconds. Nests last for 90 seconds. Holds up to 3 charges.

Abathur creates a copy of the target alled hero and takes control of it. The Evolution's attributes are based on Abathur's current level and talents. Lasts for 45 seconds.
Cannot be used on self.
Shoots a spike towards target area that deals ### damage to the first enemy it contacts. Holds 2 charges.
Deals ### damage to enemies near the ally Abathur is assisting.
Shields the assisted ally for ###. Lasts for 8 seconds.
